keywords.indexterm: Set default schema to an XML document

section.title: Result
section.p: Validation - uses the rules defined in the detected schema to report errors and warnings during automatic and manual validations that help maintain the structural integrity of your XML documents.

Content Completion - creates the content completion lists by analysing the detected schema and the current context (the position in the editor). If you change the schema, then the list of tags to be inserted is also updated.
